data.name: Hero Clicker Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Hero Clicker demo!

We are close to reaching what we we're aiming for and even more!
The demo might have lots of bugs including missing features we're planning to update and work towards the goal of a big rogue like game.

Please don't hesitate to report bugs in the steam discussions or leave feedback on certain aspects of the game.
Enjoy this small ACT 1 demo of Hero Clicker.
